text: Live With Royal Northern Sinfonia is a 2017 live album featuring Lanterns on the Lake with the Royal Northern Sinfonia orchestra. In February 2016, Lanterns on the Lake performed a one-off show at Sage Gateshead with the Royal Northern Sinfonia in a unique revision of their catalogue. Fiona Brice, wrote the arrangements. The show was recorded and released via Bella Union on vinyl in 2017, with a digital release prior to this. ==References== Category:2017 live albums Category:Bella Union albums Category:Lanterns on the Lake albums
title: Live with Royal Northern Sinfonia
